content: about month a go i asked in the stories should i write a beanie pattern and here you go it s really simple i call this hallapipo it s like frost beanie in english❄ i used 1 ball of drops air and needles size 4 5 but this is also suitable for yarns that gauge is about 17/10cm pattern cast on 80 stiches and join them in a round knit 1 from back loop and purl until the end of the round continue knitting like this until the rib measures 22cm turn the work inside out use the german short row method when you thighten the first stich slip the first stich purlwise and keep the yarn in front thighten the stich and it should look like you had two stiches there knit one round and knit the first stich as one now you will see the wrong side of the rib ahead and that s the way it must be knit 11cm until the beanie measures 33cm start decreasing k2 together k6 until the end of the round knit one round k2 together k5 until the end k one round k2tog k4 until the end knit one roud k2tog k3 and so one until you have 10 stiches left cut the yarn and pull it through all the stiches sew in the ends now you just turn the rib twice and the beanie is ready 🧶 and sorry if there is some mistakes in my english 😅
